tool.name: Add or Replace Groups:
tool.command: picard_wrapper.py --input="$inputFile" --rg-lb="$rglb" --rg-pl="$rgpl" --rg-pu="$rgpu" --rg-sm="$rgsm" --rg-opts=${readGroupOpts.rgOpts} #if $readGroupOpts.rgOpts == "full" --rg-id="$readGroupOpts.rgid" --rg-cn="$readGroupOpts.rgcn" --rg-ds="$readGroupOpts.rgds" #end if --output-format=$outputFormat #if str( $outputFormat ) == "sam" --output-sam=$outFileSam #else if str( $outputFormat ) == "bam" --output-sam=$outFileBam #end if -j "${GALAXY_DATA_INDEX_DIR}/shared/jars/" --picard-cmd="AddOrReplaceReadGroups"

param.name: inputFile
param.label: Input: sam or bam format short read data in your current history
param.help: If the select list is empty, you need to upload or import some aligned short read data from a shared library

param.name: rgOpts
param.label: Specify additional (optional) arguments
param.help: Allows you to set RGID, RGCN, and RGDS

data.name: outFileSam
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: sam with read groups replaced

data.name: outFileBam
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: bam with read groups replaced

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**Purpose**
Add or Replace Read Groups in an input bam or sam file
**Picard documentation**
This is a Galaxy interface for the Picard-tools_ tool AddOrReplaceReadGroups. Picard-tools is supported through the SAMTools_ project.
.. _Picard-tools: http://picard.sourceforge.net/index.shtml .. _SAMTools: http://samtools.sourceforge.net/
------
**Inputs**
Either a sam file or a bam file must be supplied. If a bam file is used, it must be coordinate-sorted. Galaxy currently coordinate-sorts all bam files.
**Outputs**
The output file is either bam (the default) or sam, according to user selection, and contains the same information as the input file except for the appropraite additional (or modified) read group tags. Bam is recommended since it is smaller.
**AddOrReplaceReadGroups parameters**
From the Picard documentation.
AddOrReplaceReadGroups REQUIRED parameters::
Option (Type) Description
RGLB=String Read Group Library RGPL=String Read Group platform (e.g. illumina, solid) RGPU=String Read Group platform unit (eg. run barcode) RGSM=String Read Group sample name
AddOrReplaceReadGroups OPTIONAL parameters::
Option (Type) Description
RGID=String Read Group ID; Default value: null (empty) RGCN=String Read Group sequencing center name; Default value: null (empty) RGDS=String Read Group description Default value: null (empty)
One parameter that Picard's AddOrReplaceReadGroups offers that is automatically set by Galaxy is the SORT_ORDER, which is set to coordinate.
